page.title: 06THE YOUTH CENTRE
page.content: {THE YOUTH CENTRE}WAS ONCE THE OLD GRAMMAR SCHOOL, BUT IT HAS BEEN CONVERTED TO CATER FOR LOTS OF SPORTS AND OTHER ACTIVITIES FOR BOTH YOUNG AND OLD. A YOUTH CLUB IS USUALLY HELD ON THREE EVENINGS A WEEK.THEY HAVE DISCO AND SPACE INVADERS.THERE IS A BAR WHICH IS PART OF THE SQUASH COURTS. OTHER ACTIVITIES INCLUDE:- JUDO,WEIGHT LIFTING,BADMINTON,SNOOKER,BOXING,TABLE TENNIS,ARCHERY AND SQUASH. THERE IS ALSO A PLAY GROUP WHICH MEETS AT THE YOUTH CENTRE. THE YOUTH CENTRE HAS DISCOS.THERE ARE PEOPLE FROM WHITSTONE SCHOOL THEY ARE AGED BETWEEN 9 AND 10 SOME PEOPLE GO IN THE YOUTH CENTRE IN GROUPS AND THEY ARE SOMETIMES DRESS UP POSH BECAUSE THEY DONT LIKE GOING TO DISCO LOOKING DIRTY AND PEOPLE WONDER HOW MANY GO.THEY HAVE A DARTBOAD AND HAVE GAMES
